description: Returns a list of schemas with minimal details. Schemas in Deleting status will not be included in the results. Empty results will be returned if there are no schemas available. When the RegistryId is not provided, all the schemas across registries will be part of the API response.

parameters.name: RegistryId
parameters.description: A wrapper structure that may contain the registry name and Amazon Resource Name (ARN). RegistryName (string) --- Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided. RegistryArn (string) --- Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: RegistryName
nested_params.description: Name of the registry. Used only for lookup. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_params.name: RegistryArn
nested_params.description: Arn of the registry to be updated. One of RegistryArn or RegistryName has to be provided.

nested_items.name: Schemas
nested_items.description: An array of SchemaListItem objects containing details of each schema.

nested_items.name: RegistryName
nested_items.description: the name of the registry where the schema resides.

nested_items.name: SchemaArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the schema.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a schema was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a schema was updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A continuation token for paginating the returned list of tokens, returned if the current segment of the list is not the last.
